articles.title: Hurricane Ian: Bigotry couldn't beat this family - then came the storm - BBC
articles.description: Their ancestors were among the first black Americans on Sanibel Island. Hurricane Ian drove them away.
articles.content:
By Kayla EpsteinBBC News
The Gavin family arrived on Sanibel over 100 years ago, one of the first two black families to settle on the idyllic island that dangles off the west coast of Florida like a… [+6298 chars]
